level.text: The record of a proceeding at RACD shall consist of the following:
The findings of fact and conclusions of law and the decision of the Rent Administrator;
The tape recordings or transcripts of the hearings before the hearing examiner;
All documents and exhibits offered into evidence at the hearing;
Memoranda, if any, of ex parte communications as required by §§ 4002.3 and 4002.4;
Notices of hearings and proofs of service;
Landlord registration files and any other documents found in the public record of which the Rent Administrator took official notice; and
All pleadings filed with the Rent Administrator.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 33 DCR 1336, 1365-66 (March 7, 1986).
